
```{r}
kegg_result <- run_kegg_enrich(entrez_sig_vec, organism = kegg_org,
                               p_value_cutoff = kegg_p_value_cutoff,
                               q_value_cutoff = kegg_q_value_cutoff,
                               min_gs_size = kegg_min_gs_size,
                               max_gs_size = kegg_max_gs_size,
                               p_adj_meth = kegg_p_adj_meth)
```


```{r results="asis"}
if(is.null(kegg_result)){
    cat(knitr::knit_child(
    text = "clusterProfiler::enrichKEGG returned a NULL object.",
    quiet = T
  ))
}else if(nrow(kegg_result) > 0){
    cat(knitr::knit_child(
    text = knitr::knit_expand("kegg_results.Rmd"),
    quiet = T
  ))
} else{
  cat(knitr::knit_child(
    text = "There are no enriched KEGG terms.",
    quiet = T
  ))
}
```
